mapper.insert: insert into rboard values(seq_rboard_no.nextval, #{title}, #{content}, 0, sysdate, #{userNo}, seq_rboard_no.currval, 1, 0)
insert into rboard values( seq_rboard_no.nextval, #{title}, #{content}, 0, sysdate, #{userNo}, #{groupNo}, #{orderNo}, #{depth} )
mapper.select: select b.no no, title, hit, to_char(reg_date, 'yy-mm-dd hh24:mi') regDate, u.no userNo, name writer, group_no groupNo, order_no orderNo, depth from users u, rboard b where u.no = b.user_no order by groupNo DESC, orderNo ASC

select b.no no, title, content, hit, to_char(reg_date, 'yy-mm-dd hh24:mi') regDate, u.no userNo, name writer, group_no groupNo, order_no orderNo, depth from users u, rboard b where u.no = b.user_no and b.no = #{no} order by regDate desc
